name: Xianliang Tan
story: Xianliang Tan joined the army after completing his studies in mechanical engineering. He quickly rose through the ranks due to his leadership skills and strategic thinking. He is fiercely loyal to his team and always puts their safety above everything else. Despite his calm demeanor, he can be quite stubborn at times. He married his childhood sweetheart and has a daughter whom he adores. His long-term goal is to retire from the army and start his own business.
